_aChangeLog.text: Total improvement of comlete Navigation Mesh

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_HYDRO_1

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: January 22 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for twisted and fast-paced twilight sewerage-themed map de_hydro_1 by THEnub (released May 2012). It's a fully created from scratch and precisely hand-tuned .nav-file (because in original author's archive the .nav-file was not included).

It is not too big, but rather dashingly "twirled" map. On similar maps Bot's playing very strongly depends from small (and seeming insignificant) nuances of a Navigation Mesh. And I tried to grind these fine details. How well it managed - to be judged to you! :-)

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

Play and Test... also beware of the shadows hidden in a twilight! :D

Credits and Gratitudes: THEnub (for exciting and thrilled industrial-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Move in from the Dark :-)
